recruitmentPage.bannerContent: If you are worried about your development costs skyrocketing and find it difficult to manage it, then we are here to help you.

infoODC_LBlock.heading: Making smart decision is hard
infoODC_LBlock.para: Want to know more about ODC or want to set up the ODC based on your requirements!

infoODC_RBlock.heading: Control on operations & management
infoODC_RBlock.para: An ODC on the other side of the globe can facilitate a 24-hour workday. It will allow some overlapping and also some work hours outside your local time.

infoODC_RBlock.heading: Time zone advantage
infoODC_RBlock.para: You manage your ODC as if it were your local IT division. You have your development schedules and deliverables which your ODC team adheres to.

infoODC_RBlock.heading: Long-run Engagement
infoODC_RBlock.para: In such a cost-conscious market and feeble global economy, forming an ODC has proved to be an effective way of introducing more agility into the outsourcing relationship for many organizations

infoODC_RBlock.heading: Excellent quality of work
infoODC_RBlock.para: Quality is priority. Our ODC have long-term relationships with most of our clients. We have always taken good care of their best interests by continuously fine-tuning through customer feedback.

infoODC_RBlock.heading: Dedicated development team
infoODC_RBlock.para: Once a team of software engineers is assigned, doesn't change its structure unless there is a request to do it. This stability of the team ensures higher productivity and helps to maintain minimum learning curve

infoODC_RBlock.heading: Security & confidentiality
infoODC_RBlock.para: Security policy is designed according to your requirements and regulations. You have every guarantee that only your team members have access to the work place, and network security is built. To manage your remote team you are provided with a number of reliable communication services.

howWeWork_LBlock.heading: How we provide the best solutions to our clients?
howWeWork_LBlock.para: UXGURUS always strives to be at the top levels when it comes to servicing esteemed clients as we believe excellence is everything. Our process is simple and works seamlessly for brands, individual clients, and agencies at all levels. Our only focus is to provide you with the most viable candidates to better your business

howWeWork_RBlock.list: Receive reports from your team daily

hireDeveloper_LBlock.heading: Work with highly skilled Offshore Developers
hireDeveloper_LBlock.para: Hire top-notch and highly skilled developers offshore to reduce the costs and time of delivery. The in-house talent pool we have possess expertise on all the available domains.

globalRecruitmentBlock.heading: Searching talents for your onsite team?
globalRecruitmentBlock.para: We cater to all your needs, whether its about full-time recruitment’s, partnership or ongoing management support.

keyTechnologiesBlock.heading: Delivering right solution using latest market tools
keyTechnologiesBlock.para: We continuously upscale our technology and provide development technology for almost all the verticals

whyUsBlock.heading: We transform businesses successfully through our services

carouselBlock.blockTxt: Experienced, exceptionally skilled, and certified developers
carouselBlock.blockPara: We are a group of highly enthusiastic developers and designers with over 15-20 years of experience who know the industry inside out. Our developers are well trained and can work on your projects with 100% dedication.
We believe and encourage a transparent work environment as its one of the company’s core values. Our open floor plan fosters open communication.

carouselBlock.blockTxt: Hybrid model for onsite and offshore support
carouselBlock.blockPara: We follow a combination of both onsite and offshore support models to bring the best of both worlds, along with maximizing efficiency and optimizing costs.

To ensure the security and confidentiality of information, we execute a Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA) with the Client. Any confidential information received from third parties and clients are held in strictest confidence and employees are not allowed to disclose or use it.
Our work style is to follow a consultative approach. Be it the client data or the service we provide, we give 100% assurance that you can trust us.
Our office infrastructure includes - office space, hardware, software, and communication facilities.

tailordedSetupPlanBlock.heading: Our engagement models for setting up ODC with ease
tailordedSetupPlanBlock.para: Choosing the right engagement model is one of the most important decisions in any Offshore outsourcing engagement

tailordedSetupPlanCard.heading: Fixed Cost Model
tailordedSetupPlanCard.list_4: Post time clients will be chargeable

testimonialsBlock.heading: What does our clients say about us

testimonialsCards.CardPara: UXGurus's team is very approachable and professional. They are able to understand the needs of our organization and what we are looking for in terms of candidates specifically. They are very attentive throughout.

UxGurus have been very responsive to our requests, bringing the right skillset, on-time & every time.  They have carved a niche in a chosen area. This is compelling us to continue our engagement in the days to come. It has been a win-win situation for all stakeholders.

UXGurus's team is very approachable and professional. They are able to understand the needs of our organization and what we are looking for in terms of candidates specifically. They are very attentive throughout.
